binary.name: padpng
binary.syntax: padpng [-wdt width] [-hgt height] [-xpad xpad] [-ypad ypad] [-bgcol rrggbb] [name]

option.od: print the help message and exit.
make the output image width pixels wide.
make the output image height pixels tall.
place the input image, xpad pixels from the left edge of the output image.
place the input image ypad pixels from the top edge of the output image.
set the background color of the output image to rrggbb, specified as the hexadecimal value for the 24-bit red,green and blue component color.
input image filename. If this is omitted the image will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Pad the edges of a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image.

description.p: Resizes an image by adding padding pixels of the specified background color to image.
The padded PNG image file is written to standard output.

example.description: Pad the PNG file inp.png to 720x486 pixels and store it in the file out.png
